detectors.description:
balanceOf(address) should be declared external:
	- ERC20.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/StandardToken__8.sol#4)
	- StandardToken.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/StandardToken__8.sol#108-110)

transfer(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- StandardToken.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/StandardToken__8.sol#90-97)
	- ERC20.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/StandardToken__8.sol#5)

allowance(address,address) should be declared external:

	- StandardToken.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/StandardToken__8.sol#130-132)

	- StandardToken.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/StandardToken__8.sol#124-128)

symbol() should be declared external:
